definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: He didn't even remember the name of the hero in the movie.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至连片中男主人公的名字都不记得了。

sentences.english: Conclusion:the method can be used in the quality control of Gegen Qinlian tablets.
sentences.chinese: 结论本方法可用于葛根芩连片的质量控制。

sentences.english: If used alternately with Xianglian tablet, it can help reduce the drug resistance.
sentences.chinese: 可以与香连片交替使用，以减少细菌耐药的发生。

definition: (of a large number of things) to form an expanse/to cover an area
classifier for fields/unit of area equal to one fifteenth of a hectare
lit. covering the mountains and the plains (idiom)/fig. as far as the eye can see/covering everything/omnipresent
in picturesque disorder (idiom); irregular arrangement with charming effect
continuous/unbroken/uninterrupted/extending forever into the distance (of mountain range, river etc)
